proposalId.description: proposal is the unique ID of the proposal.

voter.description: voter is the voter account address.

option.title: Vote Option
option.description: VoteOption enumerates the valid vote options for a given proposal.

metadata.description: metadata is any arbitrary metadata attached to the vote.

exec.title: Proposals and Voting
exec.description: Proposals and Voting  Exec defines modes of execution of a proposal on creation or on new vote.

MsgVote.title: Msg Vote
MsgVote.description: MsgVote is the Msg/Vote request type.
